name: FlashBriefingBookings
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Shush-already.com are a Amazon flash briefing booking agency based in Manchester UK. We can assist your business to broadcast flash briefings on Amazon Alexa on a hourly, daily or weekly basis. Your company can appear on Alexa whether it is big or small. You can steadily build your own company channel ,hosted by Shush-Already. We work with your company to develop campaigns, schedule them and then upload to Amazon Alexa for review and publication. Getting your business message onto Amazon Alexa is equivalent to using Twitter in 2006 or Instagram in 2010. There’s so much more opportunity to access free consumer traffic through voice marketing, using Amazon Alexa. You will no longer be soley reliant on SEO and Google. You can use Flash Briefings for advertising, company sales and information. Use the contact form on our website to contact our team with details of your proposed campaign on Alexa. Our website address is Shush-Already.com.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
